reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 275/20: COMPLIANCE WITH MANAGER'S PROTOCOL RESPECTING THE CORONAVIRUS (COVID-19)
reg_info.reg_name_text: COMPLIANCE WITH MANAGER’S PROTOCOL RESPECTING THE CORONAVIRUS (COVID-19)
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 275/20: COMPLIANCE WITH MANAGER'S PROTOCOL RESPECTING THE CORONAVIRUS (COVID-19)

content.content: 1. Any person who enters the Terminal for any purpose shall comply with the protocol developed by the manager of the Terminal under Ontario Regulation 269/20 (Manager’s Protocol Respecting The Coronavirus (COVID-19)) made under the Act while that protocol is in effect. 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  Français
content.raw_html:
1. Any person who enters the Terminal for any purpose shall comply with the protocol developed by the manager of the Terminal under Ontario Regulation 269/20 (Manager’s Protocol Respecting The Coronavirus (COVID-19)) made under the Act while that protocol is in effect.

2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).

 

Français
